Question: Italian Trade Agency CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ITALIAN TRADE AGENCY

CES 2024 Highlights

 - Supports Italian companies’ business development abroad
 - Promotes foreign investment in Italy
 - Exhibiting with a delegation of 53 Italian Startups
 - Showcasing products across various sectors:
   - 3D printing
   - 5G technologies
   - Augmented Reality (AR)
   - Artificial Intelligence (AI)
   - Blockchain
   - Cloud computing
   - Internet of Things (IoT)
 - Featuring innovations for:
   - Digital health
   - Entertainment
   - Fitness
   - Smart cities
   - Smart homes
